title: Installation issue: axl on NERSC Cori w/ Intel 19.1.1.217
body:
Using `spack@develop` (3-Aug, 4c97a0ea1cbcb42fff4cb2183552b6b6c441d791) on **NERSC Cori** (`cray-cnl7-haswell`) with `%intel@19.1.1.217`:

`axl` concrete spec: [axl.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5031892/axl.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [axl-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5031890/axl-build-out.txt)


```
$> spack install -f ./axl.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing axl
==> axl: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> axl: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

5 errors found in build log:
     148
     149    [100%] Linking C executable test_axl
     150    cd /tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-axl-0.3.0-nya5pea3pq4wmntleodjhqxczasln4lf/spack-build/test && /global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spac
            k_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/sp
            ack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/
            spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholde
            r/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/cmake-3.16.5-xlzhc4yr46hivtofz6axdfyokymjzb6x/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/link.txt --ver
            bose=1
     151    /global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/icc -O2 -g -DNDEBUG  -dynamic CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/test_axl.c.o CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/test_axl_sync.c.o CM
            akeFiles/test_axl.dir/test_axl_async_daemon.c.o CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/test_axl_async_ibmbb.c.o  -o test_axl  -Wl,-rpath,/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage
            -axl-0.3.0-nya5pea3pq4wmntleodjhqxczasln4lf/spack-build/src:/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/sp
            ack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/
            spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholde
            r/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/
            kvtree-1.0.2-cguacvziqltfafs4ju6oco5qc7kiqs7i/lib64:/global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path
            _placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_pa
            th_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_
            path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/zlib-1.2
            .11-oyg3d4lenw6b66sgqg5wvff5c3b3xpgb/lib ../src/libaxl.so /global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spac
            k_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/sp
            ack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/
            spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.217/kv
            tree-1.0.2-cguacvziqltfafs4ju6oco5qc7kiqs7i/lib64/libkvtree.so /global/u1/l/eugeneswalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder
            /spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placehold
            er/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeho
            lder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.1.1.2
            17/zlib-1.2.11-oyg3d4lenw6b66sgqg5wvff5c3b3xpgb/lib/libz.so
     152    icc: command line warning #10121: overriding '-xCORE-AVX2' with '-march=haswell'
     153
  >> 154    ": internal error: ** The compiler has encountered an unexpected problem.
     155    ** Segmentation violation signal raised. **
     156    Access violation or stack overflow. Please contact Intel Support for assistance.
     157
  >> 158    icc: error #10106: Fatal error in /global/common/cori_cle7/software/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2020_update1_cluster_edition/compilers_and_libraries_2020.1.217/li
            nux/bin/intel64/mcpcom, terminated by segmentation violation
  >> 159    icc: error #10014: problem during multi-file optimization compilation (code 1)
  >> 160    make[2]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/build.make:135: test/test_axl] Error 1
     161    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-axl-0.3.0-nya5pea3pq4wmntleodjhqxczasln4lf/spack-build'
  >> 162    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1017: test/CMakeFiles/test_axl.dir/all] Error 2
     163    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/eugeneswalker/spack-stage/spack-stage-axl-0.3.0-nya5pea3pq4wmntleodjhqxczasln4lf/spack-build'
     164    make: *** [Makefile:144: all] Error 2
```

@shahzebsiddiqui
